themes.name: Email Management Inefficiencies
themes.description: Customers are struggling with the management and organization of emails, leading to confusion, delays, and missed communications.

themes.name: Lack of Automation and Integration
themes.description: Customers are facing challenges due to insufficient automation and integration capabilities, leading to manual processes and inefficiencies.

sub_themes.description: Customers are facing challenges due to insufficient automation and integration capabilities, leading to manual processes and inefficiencies.

themes.name: Visibility and Tracking Issues
themes.description: Customers are struggling with visibility and tracking of emails, tasks, and performance metrics, leading to inefficiencies and confusion.

themes.name: Cost and Value Concerns

themes.name: User Experience and Setup Challenges
